queries.query_string: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'test_user_1'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS revoke_test_db
queries.query_description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs

queries.query_string: CREATE DATABASE revoke_test_db;  CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test_table (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100))
queries.query_description: Creates test database and 100 test users for REVOKE testing

queries.query_string: GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'TestPass123'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_usecase: Grant Initial Privileges to Test Users
queries.query_description: Grant SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE privileges to test users for baseline testing

queries.query_string: REVOKE SELECT ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_description: Hour 1 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on SELECT privilege

queries.query_string: REVOKE INSERT ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT INSERT ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_description: Hour 2 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on INSERT privilege

queries.query_string: REVOKE UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_description: Hour 3 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on UPDATE privilege

queries.query_string: REVOKE DELETE ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT DELETE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_description: Hour 4 baseline - 50 REVOKE operations on DELETE privilege

queries.query_string: REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON revoke_test_db.* FROM 'test_user_1'@'%'; GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON revoke_test_db.* TO 'test_user_1'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES
queries.query_description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 1000 rapid REVOKE operations - 20x normal rate indicating privilege escalation attack or insider threat

queries.query_string: SELECT user, host FROM user WHERE user LIKE 'test_user_%' LIMIT 10
queries.query_description: Verify user privileges after REVOKE operations

queries.query_string: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'test_user_1'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS revoke_test_db
queries.query_description: Remove test users and database after verification
